name: chicagotribune
text:
There a rule in journalism: You can't call a killing a murder until charges are filed, and even then only allegedly. It's a legal term, not one we assign at will. A jury decides.

George Floyd's death still looks a lot like murder to columnist @John_Kass. https://t.co/xiWaT4Kezf
